<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Friendform](/Feats.aspx?ID=2768) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The Friendform ancestry feat can be used during daily preparations to exchange tokens with other PCs. It cannot be used with NPCs, and the benefits of the ritual do not carry over between adventures._

</column>

---

The shared bond between you and your allies allows you to act on their behalf. During your daily preparations, you can perform a simple ritual with up to five willing Small or Medium humanoids, where participants exchange minor tokens of personal significance. As long as you hold onto a participant's token, you can assume their form with your [Change Shape](/Actions.aspx?ID=730) ability, gaining a +4 status bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to pass as that person and adding your level to the check even if you're untrained. You lose access to a participant's form if they're not carrying your token or if you use the ritual again.
name: Friendform
